meanings.definition: A person who studies or specializes in phrases.
meanings.sent1: The phraseologists at the university teach students about different types of phrases.
meanings.sent2: Many phraseologists enjoy researching the origins of popular sayings.
meanings.sent3: The phraseologists had a competition to see who could come up with the funniest phrase.
meanings.sent4: In the world of literature, the phraseologists are like detectives uncovering hidden meanings in sentences.
meanings.sent5: The young phraseologists were excited to learn about the power of words and expressions.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of creating or analyzing phrases.
meanings.sent1: The class on phraseology helped students understand the importance of word choice.
meanings.sent2: Modern advertising heavily relies on the expertise of phraseologists to craft catchy slogans.
meanings.sent3: During the workshop, the phraseologists had to come up with a new slogan in under five minutes.
meanings.sent4: The art of being a phraseologist is like being a painter, but with words instead of colors.
meanings.sent5: The conference brought together phraseologists from around the world to share their latest discoveries.
